Description: A description of the required file outputs. In addition to the presence of the required files, omniValidator will also check some fields described below (e.g. file extension, 'end' field).

fields.description: A description of the required file
fields.end: File extension for this file type
fields.fields: Required fields/ attributes of the outputs.
fields.substitutable_with: Other outputs that can be used as a substitute.

corrected_dim_file.description: Corrected dimension reduction of the count matrix
